last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tae-woong learns the whole truth in a painful confrontation with Geun-cheol. Gi-beom vows to put an end to Deuk-gu once and for all.

name: Rugal
overview: A police detective who loses everything to a criminal organization seeks payback when he gains special abilities through biotechnology.
tagline: When the tears dry, he becomes a monster.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After suffering a tragedy at the hands of a violent criminal group, a blind Kang Gi-beom receives an operation for a special new pair of eyes.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: On a team mission at the ARGOS leader's wedding, Gi-beom runs into someone who haunts his memories. Hwang Deuk-gu is tired of playing underling.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While ARGOS leadership engages in a power struggle, Gi-beom wonders about the origins of a dangerous device retrieved from a dead man's head.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Gi-beom's disobedience comes with consequences. When Deuk-gu unleashes chaos at a jazz club, Lee Gwang-cheol faces a chilling situation.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Left with no one to trust, Choi Ye-won realizes she needs protection. An alarming package leads the team toward a horrific ARGOS hideout.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After planting a listening device, Gi-beom makes an unexpected discovery. Han Tae-woong recalls the tragedy that brought him to RUGAL.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A high-level RUGAL employee is kidnapped. Song Mi-na sets out to bring him back, but soon comes across trouble of her own.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Gi-beom finds himself trapped. While trying to pinpoint his whereabouts, the team ends up at a crowded park — and witnesses a scene of terror.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Across the city, dead bodies crop up wearing signs that accuse Gi-beom of murder. Tae-woong delivers an ARGOS boss to the police.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Gi-beom loses control of his eyes, which have taken on a life of their own. Deuk-gu shocks RUGAL when he appears on TV with a message.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: With a bus full of civilian hostages on the line, Gi-beom knows he must face Deuk-gu alone. Bong Man-cheol grapples with an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The RUGAL team rise to fame as masked heroes against ARGOS, which has become public enemy No. 1. Deuk-gu makes an unanticipated move.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Needing answers from Deuk-gu, Gi-beom frees him from the police. A tragedy leads to revelations of secrets that Choi Geun-cheol has been keeping.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Gi-beom resists when his eyes begin directing him to kill indiscriminately, and looks for access to a video of RUGAL's beginnings.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Soon after Gi-beom wakes up with no memories, a worrying turn of events threatens the team. Meanwhile, Ye-won witnesses Deuk-gu's fearsome power.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Tae-woong learns the whole truth in a painful confrontation with Geun-cheol. Gi-beom vows to put an end to Deuk-gu once and for all.
